txt.en: A group of rowdy corsairs start to cross the swamp
Mushrooms in the Marsh

'If you are going out there to clear the roads, then I had better start filling some orders. We'll have carts out on business soon enough!\n\n'[placeholder], there is a special mushroom, only found in the marsh north-east of Tadrent. Since you're heading that way, why don't you collect a few for me?'
Some rowdy corsairs start to cross the swamp.
Collect the big orange mushroom
<rgb=#FF0000>Look around</rgb> for any more mushrooms
Collected Mushrooms ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'What took you so long? Did your boots get stuck in the mud?\n\n'And why is there a big orange mushroom in here? You know that one is poisonous, do you not?'
Fought off Corsair raiders ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect mushrooms ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Haelam is in the village of Tadrent.\n\nReturn to Haelam with the mushrooms.
Now that Haelam is confident the roads will soon be safe for travel, he wants you to go into the swamp and collect some mushrooms for an order that he has neglected to fill.
The marsh is just north-east of Tadrent.\n\nHaelam has tasked you with collecting mushrooms from the marsh.
The big orange mushroom is located in the marsh.\n\nCollect the big orange mushroom and be on your guard.
Your eye catches a big orange mushroom in the centre of the swamp. TBD Merchant would probably enjoy selling this specimen.
Return to Haelam with the mushrooms
Collected mushrooms ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
DNT
Collect mushrooms ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Fight off the corsair raiders ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
<rgb=#FF0000>Look around</rgb> for any more mushrooms.
Some rowdy corsairs start to cross the swamp. Seems they're up to no good
Some rowdy Corsairs start to cross the swamp and it seems they're up to no good
Your eye catches a big orange mushroom in the marsh. Haelam might enjoy selling this specimen
